name: Marine heatwaves in the Baltic Sea
description:
Presentation on marine heatwaves (MHW) in the Baltic Sea, delivered at the ObsSea4Clim - BioEcoOcean Clustering Event I, that took place on 11-12 March 2025 in Sopot, Poland.

The presentation was delivered by Veera Haapaniemi (FMI), representing the ObsSea4Clim project.

This presentation was part of Session 3: "Marine heatwaves (MHW) in space and time: understanding thermal anomalies at ecologically relevant scales".
